author: Special Correspondent
text:
In a case of moral policing, four youths assaulted a 19-year-old engineering student for chatting with a girl in a corporation park here on Saturday night. Police said that the youths, who came to the park, noticed the second-year engineering student, roaming with the girl – said to be his girlfriend – sporting a burkah.

They asked the student how he could have friendship with a girl belonging to their community, and started beating him.

Based on a complaint lodged by the victim, who was from Anna Nagar in the city, Tallakulam police arrested A. Agsar Khan (23) of South Gate, K. Yasser Arafat (20) of Melur, S. Rasool Badshah (22) of South Gate N. Syed Asif (20) of Tirunelveli. They have been charged with assault and criminal intimidation.

The police said that the youths had no relationship or acquaintance either with the girl or the student.

title: Youth assaulted for chatting with girl
